house_listing.house_description: Lots of living space! Good sized four bedrooms, separate living, dining & family rooms. Garage has been converted, can be used as office, rec room or 5th bedroom if needed. Large lot in quiet neighborhood. Appliances plus a home warranty - move right in!
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Attic, Cable TV, Ceiling Fan(s), Fenced, Ranch Style, Utility Room
